page.title: 11The Brass Band - Kirton
page.content: We have played at one concert and four more are lined up for the near future. I enjoy playing very much and it is nice that my sister and cousins play as well. After our concerts we split up and go over things that could have been played better,but sometimes we don't have long between concerts,so we have to practice new pieces straight away.there is a back room which we go into to catch up with the main band if we don't understand something.Our conductor is called Mr.A.Morris and he has conducted us since we began. Kirton has had a Brass Band since 1870 which makes it 115 years old,so we are very proud of playing in the band and we hope that in 115 years time there will still be a Kirton Brass Band.
